p.small: NOTE The entries in this bibliography apply to this part of ISO 10303 as a whole, not including the modules. Each module has its own bibliography.

collection_page.p: [1] ISO/IEC 8824-1, Information technology — Abstract Syntax Notation One (ASN.1) — Part 1: Specification of basic notation.

[2]
Procedure for the maintenance of ISO/TS 10303-1000, ISO TC 184/SC 4 N2413.

[3]
Guidelines for the content of application modules, ISO TC 184/SC 4 N1685, 2004-02-27.

[4]
Guidelines for the content of application protocols that use application modules, ISO TC 184/SC 4 N1686, 2004-02-25.
